73-1107.Process for selecting design-builder and entering into contract.

The process for selecting a design-builder and entering into a design-build contract shall be in accordance with sections 73-1108 to 73-1111.

SourceLaws 2025, LB660, ยง 7.Operative Date: September 3, 2025
